name: DHRUV and the Discoveries of the Tran Dynasty
name_original: DHRUV and the Discoveries of the Tran Dynasty
description:
You're the renowned warrior of the Tran Dynasty and are given the responsibility of finding the lost princess, heir to the throne, who has lost herself in the Traman forest. Help her find her way back and bring her back to the kingdom.

Do you have what it takes?
